name: Boyer Monroe
review: A timeless beauty. The watch is a wonderful sight on my wife's wrist. I bought it as a birthday/ vacation gift and it was a very wise thing to do.

name: Ortega Nunez
review: I ordered 2 different watches, one for sport and one for dress. I love them both and the prices were very good. Shipping was fast. Thanks.

name: Earlene Malone
review: Love the watch, fast delivery. Very happy! Will buy again.

name: Rena Chen
review: The selection was amazing and I noted it so that when I'm looking for something out of the ordinary I can find it at a great price. I ordered a basic Timex with a rose/gold face and light gray strap. It …

name: Ruby Blair
review: The watch that I got from Nubeo is magnificent. The delivery process was a little tricky, make sure you have a residential address rather than a PObox. It was delayed by a couple of days, but this watch was worth the wait……

name: Esperanza Branch
review: Very responsive to purchases. Watches are easy to order, and delivery was quick and secure.
